TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: I wanted to warn everyone that, according to our teacher, a highly hazardous and invisible substance has been spilled in this cave. Please avoid it!
ALNUS: Fortunately, it seems that the substance can be temporarily neutralized with water. If anyone accidentally touches it, we can use that to our advantage.
ADONSONIA: What an interesting property! I wonder if we can use that to somehow gain access to this cave.
BETULA: I don't believe that to be advisable, Adonsonia. Someone could be seriously hurt trying to do that.
BETULA: With this substance and this planet's gravity, <color=orange>The Big One</color> may be the most dangerous planet in this system!
